#summary How to use the page function.

= Page function =

The new Page function is for retrieving sites from other automatically.

Every Client can start this function for the other.
With /page <file> you can retrieve a site from another.
With /mypage <file> you can send a site to another.

When there are no <file> in the command, it is automatically index.
For set your own page you must set page in the settings on and create a file with the name index.txt or another file with the end .txt in page/ 
Now your client sent automatically this text to all the other when the command come in.
